Event.Name: Walk-A-Dog-A-Thon
Event.Description: Walk your dog in support of Trees, Water, & People. Food, Prizes, and Charity! Dogs are recommended but not required. You may walk without a dog if you'd like. Bring a water bottle, leash, bags to pick up dog poop (we will have these too), and extra donations for our charity.

Event.Name: LAN Party
Event.Description: Play video games to fight against Malaria! Bring along friends to play your favorite games together. Snacks and drinks for sale.

Event.Name: Geoguesser Night
Event.Description: Rho Kappa would love to have you at the Geoguessr Tournament! All proceeds will be donated to Make-A-Wish Colorado and ther winners will receive a special prize ;). You may have a maximum team of 3 but teams of 2 are highly recommended. Pizza will be provided.

Event.Name: Karaoke Night
Event.Description: We can't wait to see you at Karaoke Night, which all the proceeds will be going to The Kayla Foundation! We have many new and exciting things planned for this event. We will providing a dessert bar and drinks for this event!

Event.Name: Museum Field Trip
Event.Location: Denver Museum of Nature and Science
Event.Description: SNHS would like to invite you to join us at the Denver Museum of Nature and Science for a chance to have fun with friends and see all the cool exhibits! You do need to find your own transportation down there- we do not have a bus and this event begins on site at the museum at 1 pm. All proceeds will be donated to St. Jude Children's Hospital in Denver

Event.Name: Movie Night
Event.Description: Join us on our movie night to watch Twilight! All proceeds will be going towards Reach Out and Read Colorado.

Event.Name: Dodgeball Tournament
Event.Description: All proceeds from the 2024 dodgeball tournament are going to the Against Malaria Foundation. Teams of 5 are required and 3 substitutes are optional! Team Costumes are also highly encouraged.

Event.Name: Trivia Night
Event.Description: We can't wait to see you at Disco Trivia Night! We are so excited for everything we've planned. This year, the event is disco-themed, but you will also see the majority of questions from other categories! There will be tons of prizesâ€”especially for our top placers, minigame winners, and most spirited team. Teams consist of 4-5 members! If you're team isn't large enough or you haven't found a team to join, still sign up, and we will try to conglomerate individuals.
